name: OCTAPUS
description: Operon ConTextulization Across Prokaryotes to Uncover Synteny

output_prefix.help: Prefix to use for all output files

genomes_local.help: CSV file listing local genomes, with columns '#Organism name' and 'uri'

operon.help: Amino acid sequences to search for, in multi-FASTA format

operon_list.help:
Flag to input multiple sequences per gene,
    e.g. lacZ=test_data/lacZ.fasta,lacY=test_data/lacY.fasta,lacA=test_data/lacA.fasta

min_identity.help: Percent identity threshold used for alignment (default: 90)

min_coverage.help: Percent coverage threshold used for alignment (default: 50)

max_operon_gap.help: Maximum gap between genes in the same 'operon' (only used for the 'operon_context' output column) (default: 10000)

batchsize.help: Number of samples to join in each batch (default: 100)

max_evalue.help: Maximum E-value threshold used to filter initial alignments (default: 0.001)

annotations.help: If specified, annotate the regions of all genomes which contain operons

annotation_window.help: The additional area on either side of the operon to annotate (in bp) (default: 10000)

cluster_identity.help: Percent similarity used to cluster adjacent genes (default: 80)

cluster_coverage.help: Percent coverage used to cluster adjacent genes (default: 50)

nxf_profile.help: Profile used for resource allocation (standard or testing)
